articles.title: Cricket icon takes horror turn after surgery
articles.description: England legend Sir Geoffrey Boycott has been rushed to hospital with pneumonia after suffering a setback in his recovery from cancer surgery.
articles.content:
England legend Sir Geoffrey Boycott has been rushed to hospital with pneumonia after suffering a setback in his recovery from cancer surgery.
The national cricket icon, 83, went under the knife this… [+3015 chars]

articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]

articles.author: Zion Brown
articles.title: 'That's (expletive) (expletive)': Blaney doesn't know who to blame for Brickyard 400 loss - IndyStar
articles.description: Hendrick Motorsports' Ryan Blaney unleashes 8 expletives as he falls behind Kyle Larson on restart, loses Brickyard 400
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS Ryan Blaney doesnt know who to blame for what happened. Hendrick Motorsports leadership simply noted no rules were broken.
When Sundays Brickyard 400 entered overtime, Blaney was on the… [+4145 chars]
